The formatting of the XML document goes as follows: (story)>(piece)-(gap)

Story documents require that there be gap node for every piece (unless you have reached the end of the story). The gap node will include a piece of text meant to represent the type of word you're looking for the user to input (Noun verb place etc). You can write anything in a gap node, as it will be directly sent to the user.
